text: José Carlos Garcia Leal or simply Zé Carlos (born 15 July 1980 in Manga, Minas Gerais), is a Brazilian football coach and former player who played as either a left back or a midfielder. He is the current assistant manager of Confiança. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Brazil Brazil Brazil League League Copa do Brasil Copa do Brasil League Cup League Cup Total Total 2000 Goiás Série A 10 2 10 2 2001 Goiás Série A 16 2 16 2 2002 Goiás Série A 20 1 20 1 2003 São Caetano Série A 36 5 36 5 2004 Corinthians Série A 15 2 15 2 Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup J.League Cup J.League Cup Total Total 2005 Cerezo Osaka J1 League 29 6 2 0 6 2 37 8 2006 Cerezo Osaka J1 League 24 5 1 0 5 2 30 7 2007 Cerezo Osaka J2 League 35 5 2 0 - - 37 5 Brazil Brazil Brazil League League Copa do Brasil Copa do Brasil League Cup League Cup Total Total 2008 Botafogo Série A 24 4 24 4 2009 Goiás Série A Country Brazil Brazil 121 16 121 16 Country Japan Japan 88 16 5 0 11 4 104 20 Total Total Total 209 32 5 0 11 4 225 36 ==Honours== *Goiás State League: 1999, 2000, 2002 *Brazilian League (2nd division): 1999 *Brazilian Center-West Cup: 2000, 2001, 2002 ==References== Category:1980 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Minas Gerais
